text: was a Japanese freestyle wrestler. He won the world cup in 1973 and an Olympic gold medal in 1976 and placed third at the 1975 World Championships. He was born in Ōita Prefecture, Japan. Date died of a heart attack in Tokyo, Japan on 20 February 2018 at the age of 66. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1952 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Japanese wrestlers Category:People from Ōita Prefecture Category:Olympic gold medalists for Japan
title: Jiichiro Date
